author: Scott K. Johnson
title: No, Senator, science can’t do away with models
description: Here’s why Senator John Cornyn’s critique of modeling is misguided.
content:
Enlarge/ Senator John Cornyn (center, black suit) takes a photo with the 2017 astronaut class.
16 with 14 posters participating
On Friday, Texas Senator John Cornyn took to Twitter with some advice for scientists: models aren't part of the scientific method… [+9072 chars]
